scenario_text.value:
All right, kids, listen up! It’s time for
Uncle Minoru to tell you a story.
Once upon a time, in a land far, far away...
Ooohoooh! Ahah! Hurray!

You’ve got a knack with these kiddies,
Minoru, my boy.
Heheh, I know, right?

I just imagined what Miu would do in
a situation like this.

Everything gets so easy, it feels like
a damn joke...
Minoru...
Minoru’s stories get me all excited, somehow!
We should listen to his stories too, Takuma!

For real? Agumon I kinda get, but you like
tall tales for pint-sized tykes, Takuma?
Uhh, well maybe?

(I have so many things to think about. Is it
really okay to play around like this?)

(On the other hand, I can’t keep running on
all cylinders constantly...)

(Besides, it’s rare to see Minoru telling
stories like this. Could be fun.)
(Should I listen to Minoru’s stories?)
No kid stuff for me.
Why not listen a bit?
I’ll pass for now.
No thanks, this stuff’s for kids.

That’s what I’m saying! Having you in the
audience makes it harder for me too, man.

Really? You look like you’re having so much
fun, though.

Gimme another chance when things calm down.
I’ll talk your ears off, I swear.
No fair!

Might as well take this chance to listen.
Mind if I join, Minoru?
Sure, but I doubt it’ll keep you interested.
I wanna hear, I wanna hear!

No skin off my nose. Just don’t expect too
much, all right?
Oooh, I can’t WAIT!
Okay, then here we go. AHEM!

Once, a long time ago, a bamboo boy was born
from a bamboo tree...

(Is he seriously just making this up as he
goes?!)

I’m good for now. I need to think about
what’s coming up ahead.

Don’t stress yourself out too much, all
right?
Sounds like something Falcomon would say.

Ho, indeed it does. Perhaps I am rubbing off
on him after all our time together.

Hold up, does that mean Falcomon’s getting
more Minoru-ish all the time?
I mean...
(I honestly can’t imagine it.)
Finish that sentence!

I’ll look after the kiddies. You can go see
how the others are doing.
